about_the_game:
Try yourself as a store seller where your visitors will be cute little animals!

This simulator will immerse you in the small world of a flying airship-store!

Your visitors will be animals of different types:
Hamsters, hares, cats and dogs.

All the animals have different tastes in products, and your main and most important task is to sell products taking into account the wishes of customers!

You also need to monitor the condition of the store so that everything is clean and works like a clock!
In order to set up the work of the store, you will need to turn to special tools on the shelves!

Relax and immerse yourself in this small and cozy store!
